channel.title: Comments on: I’m curious to know whether we have received…

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: As I mentioned to you recently Jim, I also wonder if people are unclear on what "active learning" means. It sounds like eduspeak, but I'm not sure what's better. Discussion zone?
item.content:encoded: As I mentioned to you recently Jim, I also wonder if people are unclear on what “active learning” means. It sounds like eduspeak, but I’m not sure what’s better. Discussion zone?

item.title: By: Jim Munson
item.dc:creator: Jim Munson
item.description: The feedback we've gotten on the open group study areas is that people feel uncomfortable speaking out loud, despite signage to the contrary. One potential solution is better publicity of the noise policy. And, of course, if/when we get a coffee kiosk installed, that should totally take care of the problem. As for the standups, it appears they're not placed optimally. Folks who want a quickstop work station seem walking the extra ~ 30 feet to the sit down stations, where they also have some work surface to put their stuff down and aren't so much in the flow of traffic. Still, we keep observing and tweaking ....
item.content:encoded: The feedback we’ve gotten on the open group study areas is that people feel uncomfortable speaking out loud, despite signage to the contrary. One potential solution is better publicity of the noise policy. And, of course, if/when we get a coffee kiosk installed, that should totally take care of the problem. As for the standups, it appears they’re not placed optimally. Folks who want a quickstop work station seem walking the extra ~ 30 feet to the sit down stations, where they also have some work surface to put their stuff down and aren’t so much in the flow of traffic. Still, we keep observing and tweaking ….
